mapper.select: select * from release_activity where id=#{activiid} order by id
select * from release_activity where activityname LIKE '%' #{name} '%' order by id
select * from release_activity where activitynumber LIKE '%' #{tole} '%' order by id

SELECT *, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{0}*PI()/180-lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{0}*PI()/180)*COS(lat*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{1}*PI()/180-lng*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS juli FROM release_activity where city=#{2} and type=1 ORDER BY juli LIMIT 50

SELECT *, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{0}*PI()/180-lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{0}*PI()/180)*COS(lat*PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{1}*PI()/180-lng*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS juli FROM release_activity where city=#{2} and type=1 and activitycategory=#{3} ORDER BY juli LIMIT 50
